key_risks: Litigation and regulatory risks from class-action lawsuits and investigations
Exposure to climate change and catastrophic events impacting underwriting profitability
Competitive pressures from traditional insurers and insurtech companies
Dependence on reinsurance and distribution partners
controversies: Legal disputes related to claims handling practices and compliance with state insurance regulations
Ethical concerns regarding duty to defend and indemnify claims
environmental_issues: Increased frequency and severity of natural disasters due to climate change
social_issues: Reputational damage and customer trust issues from claims handling practices
governance_issues: Corporate governance challenges related to enterprise risk management
